PyDataSource.Detector¶

class PyDataSource.Detector(ds, alias, verbose=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Includes epicsData, configData, evrConfig info Uses full ds in order to be able to access epicsData info on an event basis.

__init__(ds, alias, verbose=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Initialize a psana Detector class for a given detector alias. Provides the attributes of the PyDetector functions for the current event if applicable. Otherwise provides the attributes from the raw data in the psana event keys for the given detector.

Methods

__init__(ds, alias[, verbose]) Initialize a psana Detector class for a given detector alias.
monitor([attrs, nevents, sleep]) Monitor detector attributes continuously with show_info function.
next(**kwargs) Return next event that contains the Detector in the event data.
set_cmpars(cmpars) Set common mode.
show_all(**kwargs) Show detailed detector information for current event.
show_info([attrs]) Show basic detector information, including from user defined AddOn methods, for current event.

Attributes

add Add data processing methods.
calibData Calibration data using psana.Detector class
configData Configuration data for detector.
detector Raw, calib and image data using psana.Detector class.
epicsData Epics information for current detector.
evtData Tab accessible raw data from psana event keys.
psplots To kill a plot that has been created with self.add.psplot, del self.psplots[name] and close the plot window.
sourceData Source information for detector.
